title: How to Print from Internet Explorer

steps.headline: Locate the page you'd like to print through any way you find easiest.
Right-click anywhere on the clean background of the browser.
Fix the print settings for your desired print options.
steps.description: This includes the quantity of copies desired, page selection locations, page orientation (portrait (default) to landscape and vice versa) and selected printer.

steps.headline: Click the "Apply" button, if you've made changes at first.
Click the "Print" button if you haven't made changes.

text: Open your Internet Explorer browser.  Locate the page you'd like to print through any way you find easiest.  Right-click anywhere on the clean background of the browser.  Click "Print"  Fix the print settings for your desired print options. This includes the quantity of copies desired, page selection locations, page orientation (portrait (default) to landscape and vice versa) and selected printer. Click the "Apply" button, if you've made changes at first.  Click the "Print" button if you haven't made changes.
sentences: Locate the page you'd like to print through any way you find easiest.
Right-click anywhere on the clean background of the browser.
Click "Print"  Fix the print settings for your desired print options.
This includes the quantity of copies desired, page selection locations, page orientation (portrait (default) to landscape and vice versa) and selected printer.
Click the "Apply" button, if you've made changes at first.
Click the "Print" button if you haven't made changes.
